channel.title: Promiscuous Eye
channel.description: Hosted by indpendent curator, Ingrid LaFleur, promiscuouseye is the ultimate exploration of art on the cutting-edge. LaFleur travels the world interviewing artists, collectors, curators, and dealers to obtain up to date information on the contemporary art world.
channel.itunes:author: Ingrid LaFleur
channel.itunes:summary: promiscuouseye is the artdiary of independent curator, Ingrid LaFleur. LaFleur travels internationally documenting cutting-edge artists and art professionals.
channel.itunes:subtitle: An exploration of the contemporary art world.

item.title: Hassan Khan
item.description: I spoke with Hassan Khan about his creative process for the four channel video, Hidden Location, now showing at Gasworks Gallery in London.
item.itunes:author: Ingrid LaFleur
item.itunes:summary: I spoke with Hassan Khan about his creative process for the four channel video, Hidden Location, now showing at Gasworks Gallery in London.

item.title: Sol'Sax
item.description: Sol'Sax explains how he intermixes contemporary street culture with Yoruba symbolism.
item.itunes:author: Ingrid LaFleur
item.itunes:summary: Sol'Sax explains how he intermixes contemporary street culture with Yoruba symbolism.

item.title: Torkwase Dyson
item.description: Artist Torkwase Dyson shares her ideas about art and education.
item.itunes:author: Ingrid LaFleur
item.itunes:summary: Artist Torkwase Dyson shares her ideas about art and education.

item.title: Marco Villalobos
item.description: Marco Villalobos discusses his video, El Negro Mas Chulo, and his collaboration with photographer Ayana V Jackson on their project African by Legacy, Mexican by Birth.
item.itunes:author: Ingrid LaFleur
item.itunes:summary: Marco Villalobos discusses his video, El Negro Mas Chulo, and his collaboration with photographer Ayana V Jackson on their project African by Legacy, Mexican by Birth.

item.title: Ty G
item.description: Ty G from Heavyweight Production House gives us a peak into live painting.
item.itunes:author: Ingrid LaFleur
item.itunes:summary: Ty G from Heavyweight Production House gives us a peak into live painting.

item.title: Marco Villalobos
item.description: Marco Villalobos discusses his video taken in Mexico for a collaborative project entitled African by Legacy, Mexican by birth.
item.itunes:author: Ingrid LaFleur
item.itunes:summary: Marco Villalobos discusses his video taken in Mexico for a collaborative project entitled African by Legacy, Mexican by birth.

item.title: Derrick Adams
item.description: Derrick Adams explains his performance art and shares his curatorial perspective on contemporary artists.
item.itunes:author: Ingrid LaFleur
item.itunes:summary: Derrick Adams explains his performance art and shares his curatorial perspective on contemporary artists.
